objects.text:
Premium Canvas Upper Material
Lightweight Construction For All-Day Wear
Cushioned Insole For Enhanced Comfort
Clean Minimalist Design For Any Outfit

product_details.name: Classic Canvas Comfort: Urban Navy Sneakers with Modern Style
product_details.description:
• Premium navy blue canvas upper material for breathability and durability
• Clean minimalist design perfect for casual and smart-casual outfits
• Crisp white rubber sole providing excellent grip and comfort
• Metal eyelets with matching navy laces for secure fit
• Lightweight construction ideal for all-day wear
• Versatile color scheme that pairs well with any outfit
• Cushioned insole for enhanced comfort
• Classic low-top silhouette for timeless appeal
• Easy-to-clean canvas material
• Available in unisex sizing

banner_details:
The banner showcases a clean and modern layout designed to highlight a fashion footwear product. At the top, bold uppercase text identified by the **"heading"** ID introduces the product collection in a deep navy tone. Directly below, a slightly stylized, dark blue subheading (**"subheading"**) provides the specific product name. The **"description"** text block offers a concise list of features in a smaller, legible font, using a minimalist black tone. A clear and prominent price element (**"price"**) in bold navy blue bolsters the value proposition. Below it, a **"cta"** (Call to Action) invites the shopper to engage, placed atop a dark blue button (**"cta_background"**). Center-right, a **"product_image"** showcases the sneakers, partly overlapping a translucent white inner-paneled box within elegantly layered decorative SVG frames enhancing visual structure and sophistication.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue (#1A3A6C)
- Soft Blue (#3A5A8C)
- Light Gray (#F1F3F7)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Charcoal Black (#333333)
product_color: The product image features a stylish pair of canvas shoes prominently colored in deep navy blue (#1C3A63), which imparts a sleek and modern look. This primary color dominates the shoe's fabric material, creating a bold, clean aesthetic. The laces and stitching are subtly darker navy blue (#152B4B), maintaining visual consistency while adding texture. Accents like the eyelets are metallic silver (#C0C0C0), offering a contrast that highlights functional detailing. The sole is a soft pastel blue-gray (#E3E8F0), adding contrast without overpowering the overall tone. These colors blend harmoniously, balancing depth and simplicity, ideal for an advertisement with a modern, minimalistic theme.
